metadata.title: CVE-2021-3732 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's OverlayFS subsystem in the way theuser mounts the TmpFS filesystem with OverlayFS. This flaw allows a localuser to gain access to hidden files that should not be accessible.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
